package.name: zendframework/zend-expressive
package.description: PSR-7 Middleware Microframework based on Stratigility

dev-master.name: zendframework/zend-expressive
dev-master.description: PSR-7 Middleware Microframework based on Stratigility

suggest.nikic\/fast-route: ^0.6.0 to use the FastRoute routing adapter
suggest.zendframework\/zend-mvc: ^2.5 to use the zend-mvc TreeRouteStack routing adapter
suggest.zendframework\/zend-psr7bridge: ^0.1.0 to use the zend-mvc TreeRouteStack routing adapter
suggest.league\/plates: ^3.1 to use the Plates template adapter
suggest.twig\/twig: ^1.19 to use the Twig template adapter
suggest.aura\/router: ^2.3 to use the Aura.Router routing adapter
suggest.filp\/whoops: ^1.1 to use the Whoops error handler
suggest.mouf\/pimple-interop: ^1.0 to use Pimple for dependency injection
suggest.zendframework\/zend-servicemanager: ^2.5 to use zend-servicemanager for dependency injection
suggest.zendframework\/zend-view: ^2.5 to use the zend-view template adapter
